properties.name: Mt. Victoria Reserve (Takarunga)
properties.location:
75 Kerr Street
 Devonport, Auckland 0375
 New Zealand
properties.description: Mt. Victoria Reserve (Takarunga) is a popular hilltop park located in Devonport, Auckland, offering stunning panoramic views of the Auckland skyline, the Waitemata Harbour, and surrounding landscapes. This historic site is rich in Māori traditions and features remnants of military fortifications from the 19th century. Visitors can enjoy various walking tracks, lush native vegetation, and picnic areas, making it an excellent destination for outdoor activities and relaxation. The reserve is easily accessible, providing a peaceful escape just a short distance from the bustling city.

properties.name: Cheltenham Beach
properties.location:
Bath Street
 Devonport, Auckland 0375
 New Zealand
properties.description: Cheltenham Beach is a picturesque destination located on the North Shore of Auckland, New Zealand. This scenic beach features soft golden sands and stunning views of the Waitemata Harbour and Rangitoto Island. The area is popular for swimming, sunbathing, and picnicking, attracting both locals and tourists. There are scenic walkways nearby that allow visitors to explore the coastal landscape and enjoy the surrounding parks. In addition to its natural beauty, Cheltenham Beach serves as a great spot for various recreational activities, making it a favored choice for a relaxing day out.

properties.name: Five Loaves
properties.location:
76 Church Street
 Devonport, Auckland 0375
 New Zealand
properties.description: Five Loaves is a local café located at 29 Church Street in Devonport, Auckland, New Zealand. The café offers a variety of dishes and beverages, including vegetarian and vegan options. It is known for its friendly staff and welcoming atmosphere, making it a popular spot for both locals and visitors.

properties.name: Dulcie
properties.location:
11 King Edward Parade
 Devonport, Auckland 0375
 New Zealand
properties.description: Dulcie is a sophisticated daytime eatery situated in a historic building on Devonport's King Edward Parade, offering stunning sea views. The menu emphasizes local produce and sustainable practices, featuring dishes like curried scrambled eggs with saagwala sauce and fried curry leaves, and pancakes topped with blueberry compote, elderflower and lemon syrup, and coconut whip. For lunch, options include clam linguine, slow-cooked lamb shoulder, and a refined take on fish and chips served with gribiche sauce and smashed peas. The interior boasts high ceilings, polished wood floors, and rimu-topped tables, creating a warm and welcoming atmosphere. Coffee is sourced from Atomic Coffee Roasters, and the drinks list highlights local wines and craft beers.

properties.name: Escape HQ
properties.location:
562 Lake Road
 Takapuna, Auckland 0377
 New Zealand
properties.description: Escape HQ Auckland is a premier escape room experience located in Takapuna. It offers themed rooms where participants solve puzzles and complete challenges to escape within a time limit. Ideal for groups looking for a unique and engaging activity, the venue caters to various skill levels and ages. The immersive environments and captivating storylines enhance the adventure, making it a popular choice for both locals and tourists seeking entertainment and teamwork in a fun atmosphere.

properties.name: The Grange
properties.location:
Cnr The Boulevard and Smales Farm Ave
 Takapuna, Auckland 0511
 New Zealand
properties.description: The Grange is a modern European bar and bistro located in the Goodside precinct of Smales Farm, Takapuna. The restaurant offers a seasonal and ever-changing menu that highlights the best of New Zealand's fresh produce. Guests can enjoy a variety of dishes, including in-house baked goods, roast dinners, Wagyu burgers, and an acclaimed charcuterie board featuring cured meats, pâté, cheeses, pickles, chutneys, salmon rillette, Parker House rolls, and garlic butter. The venue features a greenhouse setting for sunset dinners, providing a unique dining atmosphere. The Grange also hosts live music and happy hours on weekends, enhancing the dining experience.

properties.name: Takapuna
properties.location:
Takapuna
 Auckland
 New Zealand
properties.description: Takapuna is renowned for its stunning beach, which offers a picturesque view of Rangitoto Island and is a favorite spot for swimming, paddleboarding, and other water activities. The area is also known for its bustling shopping district, featuring a mix of boutique stores, cafes, and restaurants. Takapuna hosts a variety of events throughout the year, including markets and cultural festivals, making it a lively and engaging place to visit. The suburb is also home to the Bruce Mason Centre, a prominent performing arts venue, and offers easy access to nearby attractions such as Lake Pupuke, a volcanic crater lake popular for rowing and sailing.

properties.name: Smiths Bush
properties.location:
Northcote
 Auckland 0378
 New Zealand
properties.description: Smiths Bush Scenic Reserve is a 5.9-hectare remnant native forest located in Northcote, Auckland. It features looped walking tracks on elevated boardwalks, allowing visitors to explore a cathedral grove of giant pūriri, kahikatea, and tōtara trees. The reserve is accessible via Akoranga Drive, through Kitewao Street Esplanade Reserve and Onewa Domain. Dogs must be on a leash at all times within the reserve. Nearby, Onewa Domain and Kitewao Street Esplanade Reserve offer additional recreational opportunities.

properties.name: Northcote Tavern
properties.location:
79 Queen Street
 Northcote Point, Auckland 0329
 New Zealand
properties.description: Northcote Tavern, established in the 1800s, is a historic pub located at 37 Queen Street, Northcote Point, Auckland 0627, New Zealand. It offers a blend of traditional charm and modern amenities, featuring two distinct bar areas: Callan's Sports Bar, equipped with widescreen TVs and gaming facilities, and the Highlander Bar, adorned with Scottish memorabilia. The tavern boasts a spacious outdoor garden bar, ideal for sunny days, and Point Espresso, serving coffee and light refreshments. Known for hearty pub meals and a welcoming atmosphere, Northcote Tavern has become a cherished spot for both locals and visitors.

properties.name: Auckland Harbour Bridge
properties.location:
Northcote Point
 Auckland 2022
 New Zealand
properties.description: The Auckland Harbour Bridge is a vital transportation link that spans the Waitematā Harbour, connecting Auckland City with the North Shore. Opened in 1959, the bridge is an iconic structure in New Zealand, stretching approximately 1,020 meters (3,350 feet) in length. It features eight lanes and is a key route for commuters and travelers. The bridge is not only a functional piece of infrastructure but also a popular attraction for thrill-seekers, offering the unique experience of bridge climbing. Participants can enjoy panoramic views of the city and the surrounding harbor from the top of the bridge.

properties.name: Sails Restaurant
properties.location:
901-991 Westhaven Drive
 St Marys Bay, Auckland 9955
 New Zealand
properties.description: Sails Restaurant is situated in the heart of Westhaven Marina, offering panoramic views of Auckland's harbor, including the Harbour Bridge, North Head, and Rangitoto Island. Over the past three decades, it has built a reputation for exceptional seafood-focused Kiwi cuisine, utilizing the freshest local ingredients. The elegant interior complements the stunning vistas, providing a memorable dining experience. The restaurant also boasts an extensive wine list, featuring both local and international selections. With a commitment to quality and service, Sails Restaurant remains a top choice for both locals and visitors seeking fine dining in Auckland.

properties.name: Point Erin Park
properties.location:
65 Shelly Beach Road
 Westhaven, Auckland 9099
 New Zealand
properties.description: Point Erin Park is a picturesque public park located in Westhaven, Auckland. This green space features well-maintained gardens, walking paths, and recreational facilities, including sports fields and children's play areas. Visitors can enjoy stunning views of the surrounding waterfront and the iconic Auckland skyline. The park is perfect for leisurely strolls, picnics, and various outdoor activities, making it a popular destination for both locals and tourists looking to relax and unwind in a natural setting.

properties.name: AJ Hackett Auckland Bridge Bungy & Climb
properties.location:
902 Curran Street, Westhaven Reserve
 Herne Bay, Auckland 9099
 New Zealand
properties.description: AJ Hackett Auckland Bridge Bungy & Climb offers thrilling experiences for adventure seekers at the iconic Auckland Harbour Bridge. Visitors can partake in the world's first urban bungy, leap from 40 meters above the water, or take part in guided climbs with stunning views over the Waitemata Harbour. This attraction provides safety equipment and a professional team to ensure a secure experience. It's a popular choice for locals and tourists alike, delivering unforgettable adrenaline-fueled moments against a backdrop of stunning scenery.

properties.name: Swashbucklers Restaurant & Bar
properties.location:
34B Westhaven Drive
 Auckland Central, Auckland 2020
 New Zealand
properties.description: Swashbucklers Restaurant & Bar, established in 1997, is a renowned seafood dining destination situated on the edge of Auckland's Westhaven Marina. The venue offers a relaxed atmosphere with both indoor and outdoor seating, providing picturesque views of the marina and the Auckland Harbour Bridge. The menu features a variety of seafood dishes, including fresh oysters, seafood chowder, and fish and chips, alongside steak and chicken options. The Boatshed Bar serves a selection of beers and wines, complementing the dining experience. The establishment is known for its friendly service and nautical-themed decor, making it a popular choice for both locals and visitors seeking a quintessential Auckland dining experience.

properties.name: Silo Park
properties.location:
Corner Beaumont Street and Jellicoe, Jellicoe Street
 Auckland CBD, Auckland 9090
 New Zealand
properties.description: Silo Park, located at the intersection of Beaumont and Jellicoe Streets, is a vibrant public park that showcases the transformation of Auckland's waterfront. The park features repurposed industrial silos, green open spaces, and artistic installations, making it a unique recreational area. It hosts various events, markets, and outdoor cinema screenings, attracting both residents and visitors. The space is designed to promote community engagement and offers a picturesque setting for leisure activities, with paths for walking and cycling, as well as seating areas for relaxation.

properties.name: The Good Luck Coconut
properties.location:
16 Jellicoe Street
 Auckland Central, Auckland 9090
 New Zealand
properties.description: The Good Luck Coconut is a tiki bar and restaurant situated in Auckland's Wynyard Quarter. It offers a fusion of Pacific and Asian-inspired dishes, including sharing plates and fire pit options. The venue features a tiki bar serving tropical cocktails and has a relaxed, island-inspired ambiance with nautical-themed decor. The establishment is wheelchair accessible and offers both indoor and outdoor seating.

properties.name: Good George
properties.location:
4 Jellicoe Street
 North Wharf, Auckland 4040
 New Zealand
properties.description: Good George North Wharf is a waterfront restaurant located at 1 Jellicoe Street in Auckland's Wynyard Quarter. Established in November 2019, it offers a selection of fresh, unpasteurized beers and ciders directly from the brewery in Waikato. The menu features New Zealand cuisine, emphasizing locally sourced produce, meats, and seafood. The venue provides both indoor and outdoor seating, allowing guests to enjoy views of the harbor. The restaurant is wheelchair accessible and accommodates large groups, families, and intimate dinners. It is easily accessible by car, ferry, bus, or tram.

properties.name: Milenta
properties.location:
620-627 Victoria Street West
 Auckland 2020
 New Zealand
properties.description: Milenta is a South American-inspired restaurant located in Auckland's Victoria Park Market. The open-air kitchen, situated beneath a large pōhutakawa tree, features an alfresco setup where dishes are prepared over wood coals. The menu offers a variety of dishes, including fire-roasted artichoke with stracciatella and pomegranate, and smoky eggplant torta with pineapple, pico de gallo, and charred corn. The restaurant's design, crafted by Izzard Design, complements the outdoor setting, creating a unique dining experience. Milenta has been recognized as Auckland's best summer restaurant in 2023.

properties.name: Victoria Park
properties.location:
605-692 Victoria Street West
 Auckland CBD, Auckland 2020
 New Zealand
properties.description: Victoria Park, established in 1905 and named after Queen Victoria, is a public park situated in Auckland's central business district. Located on reclaimed land in Freemans Bay, it offers expansive green spaces, sports fields, and recreational facilities. The park features pathways suitable for walking and jogging, playgrounds for children, and sports courts for activities like cricket and soccer. Adjacent to the park is the Victoria Park Market, a heritage precinct housing various shops, cafes, and restaurants. The park's central location makes it easily accessible from Auckland's city center, providing a serene escape amidst the urban environment.

properties.name: Grand Harbour
properties.location:
Cnr Customs Street West and, Pakenham Street East
 CBD, Auckland 9090
 New Zealand
properties.description: Grand Harbour Chinese Restaurant, established in 2000, is renowned for its authentic Hong Kong-style dishes. Specializing in duck and a variety of seafood, including lobster, fish, and crab, it offers an extensive beverage selection and comfortable surroundings. The spacious venue accommodates up to 300 guests, making it suitable for large groups. Located just a two-minute walk from the Viaduct Harbour and close to major hotels, it serves Yum Cha daily, featuring around 80 varieties of dim sum. The restaurant is open for lunch and dinner, with specific hours on weekdays and weekends.

properties.name: Oyster and Chop
properties.location:
Market Place
 Viaduct, Auckland 3030
 New Zealand
properties.description: Oyster & Chop is a renowned restaurant located in Auckland's Viaduct Harbour, specializing in premium steaks and a wide selection of fresh oysters. The menu features grass and grain-fed beef and lamb cuts, sourced both domestically and internationally, prepared to your liking on a state-of-the-art grill. The oyster bar offers up to 10 varieties of oysters, freshly shucked and served in seven different ways. Situated in the heart of Viaduct Harbour, the restaurant provides stunning water views from every table, making it an ideal spot for various occasions.

properties.name: The Lula Inn
properties.location:
281 Quay Street
 Auckland Central, Auckland 2020
 New Zealand
properties.description: The Lula Inn is a South Pacific-inspired eatery and drinkery located at 149 Quay Street, Auckland Central, Auckland 1010, New Zealand. Situated on the historic Princes Wharf, it offers a relaxed colonial charm with a tropical-inspired interior, featuring an over-water deck and a garden oasis atmosphere. The menu includes fresh, locally sourced dishes with a Kiwi twist, such as seafood platters, pork belly, and steak. The bar boasts an impressive selection of over 100 gins and tropical-inspired cocktails. Live music and DJs provide entertainment on weekends, making it a popular destination for both locals and tourists.

properties.name: White + Wong's - Auckland Viaduct, CBD
properties.location:
281 Quay Street Cnr Lower Hobson & Quay Street
 Auckland 2020
 New Zealand
properties.description: White + Wong's is an Asian fusion restaurant located in Auckland's Viaduct Harbour, offering a blend of classic street foods from China, Hong Kong, Vietnam, Malaysia, and Thailand. The menu features dishes like massaman and red curries made from scratch, oysters with freshly ground wasabi root, and signature items such as bang bang chicken and BBQ pork buns. The restaurant also offers whole Peking Ducks, numbing prawns, and BBQ meats, reimagining traditional Chinese street food. Situated along Quay Street, it provides a vibrant dining experience with waterfront views.

properties.name: New Zealand Maritime Museum
properties.location:
Corner of Quay and Hobson Street
 Auckland 2280
 New Zealand
properties.description: The New Zealand Maritime Museum, also known as Hui Te Ananui a Tangaroa, is situated in Auckland's Viaduct Harbour. It showcases New Zealand's maritime history, from early Polynesian voyaging to modern America's Cup achievements. The museum features interactive exhibits, including a replica 1840s rocking cabin and a full-sized oystering boat named Monica. Visitors can embark on heritage sailings aboard vessels like the Ted Ashby, a 19th-century scow, and the vintage motor launch Nautilus. The museum is open daily from 10 am to 5 pm, with free entry for Auckland residents.

properties.name: Auckland Dolphin and Whale Watching Eco-Safari Cruise
properties.location:
57 Customs Street West
 Auckland Central, Auckland 9090
 New Zealand
properties.description: Look for whales, dolphins and seabirds in the pristine waters of Hauraki Gulf just a short boat ride from Auckland city's Viaduct Harbour. Learn from experts on board working to protect these precious creatures and their fragile home. As an active marine-mammal research vessel every passenger contributes to important conservation efforts, just by coming on board.

properties.name: Ebisu
properties.location:
995 - 997 Quay Street
 Auckland CBD, Auckland 9090
 New Zealand
properties.description: Ebisu is a modern Japanese restaurant situated in a historic building in Auckland's Britomart precinct, offering contemporary Japanese cuisine in a stylish waterfront setting. The menu combines traditional Japanese dishes with European techniques, featuring new-style sushi, sashimi, and innovative twists on classic dishes. An extensive selection of sake, Japan-inspired cocktails, and a range of local and imported beers are available. The restaurant provides comfortable booths and tables for guests to enjoy their meals.

properties.name: Amano
properties.location:
55 - 57, Tyler Street, Britomart Place
 Auckland CBD, Auckland 9090
 New Zealand
properties.description: Amano is a renowned restaurant and bakery situated in Auckland's vibrant Britomart area. Housed in a converted heritage warehouse, it offers a rustic Italian dining experience with a focus on seasonal, sustainable, and locally sourced New Zealand produce. The menu features handmade pastas, wood-fired meats, and fresh seafood, all prepared with traditional Italian techniques. The adjoining bakery is celebrated for its artisanal breads and pastries, including acclaimed croissants and sourdough loaves. The stylish yet relaxed atmosphere, complemented by an open kitchen and high ceilings, makes it a popular destination for both locals and visitors seeking authentic Italian cuisine in Auckland.

properties.name: Shed 10
properties.location:
91 Quay Street
 Auckland Central, Auckland 2020
 New Zealand
properties.description: Shed 10 is a prominent historic building located on Auckland's waterfront, serving as a cruise ship terminal and an event space. Originally constructed in the 19th century, it has been renovated to preserve its heritage while accommodating modern needs. The venue features panoramic views of the harbor and is used for various events, including weddings and corporate functions. Visitors can also explore the surrounding area, which boasts numerous shops, restaurants, and attractions, making Shed 10 a key part of Auckland's vibrant waterfront experience.

properties.name: Spark Arena
properties.location: 63/40 Mahuhu Crescent Parnell, Auckland 5050 New Zealand
properties.description: Spark Arena is a premier multipurpose venue in Auckland, New Zealand, renowned for hosting a diverse array of events since its opening in 2007. With a capacity of over 12,000, it accommodates major international concerts, sporting events, family shows, and large-scale community gatherings. The arena's flexible seating configurations allow for intimate settings ranging from 1,800 to 12,000 attendees. Conveniently situated near the Auckland City Centre, it is easily accessible via public transport, including bus, train, and ferry services, as well as by car, with numerous parking options available nearby.

properties.name: Carbon Garage
properties.location:
4/3 Quay Street Auckland City
 Auckland Central
 Auckland 9090 New Zealand
properties.description: Carbon Garage is a must-see destination cafe if you love classic motorcycles and coffee! There are superbikes from around the globe on display. The owners of Carbon Garage have a special affection for special motorcycles from the 80's and 90's and always have a selection of these rarities on display in the showrooms. Carbon Garage is quite unique, and includes a modern well equipped motorcycle workshop next to a charismatic café.

properties.name: Helicopter Me
properties.location:
3 Solent Street
 Judges Bay, Auckland 3030
 New Zealand
properties.description: Helicopter Me is a premier helicopter tour operator in New Zealand, offering breathtaking aerial experiences over Auckland and its stunning landscapes. With a fleet of modern helicopters, the company provides a range of tours, including city flights, volcano tours, and bespoke charters. Passengers can enjoy panoramic views of iconic sites such as the Sky Tower, Hauraki Gulf, and the lush vineyards of Waiheke Island. Known for its commitment to safety and customer satisfaction, Helicopter Me ensures a memorable journey with experienced pilots and personalized service.

properties.name: Dove Myer Robinson Park
properties.location:
57-52 Gladstone Road
 Parnell, Auckland 9074
 New Zealand
properties.description: Dove Myer Robinson Park, located in Parnell, Auckland, is renowned for its stunning rose garden, featuring thousands of rose bushes in vibrant colors. The park offers beautifully manicured landscapes, walking paths, and scenic views, making it a favorite spot for both locals and visitors. Originally established in the 1960s, it hosts various events and serves as a peaceful retreat amidst the urban environment. The park provides ample space for picnics, family outings, and leisurely strolls, attracting nature lovers and photographers alike.

properties.name: Fergs Kayaks
properties.location:
26 Tamaki Drive
 Orakei, Auckland 2092
 New Zealand
properties.description: Fergs Kayaks is a renowned provider of kayaking and outdoor adventure experiences located on Tamaki Drive in Auckland. The facility offers a variety of services, including kayak rentals, guided tours, and lessons tailored for all skill levels. Situated near the picturesque Auckland waterfront, Fergs Kayaks provides easy access to stunning coastal views and nearby islands. Their dedicated team ensures a safe and enjoyable experience for adventurers, whether they are beginners or seasoned paddlers.

properties.name: Okahu Bay Beach
properties.location:
Okahu Bay Beach
 Auckland 2092
 New Zealand
properties.description: Okahu Bay Beach is a beautiful waterfront destination located in Auckland, known for its stunning views of the Hauraki Gulf. This beach offers a range of recreational activities, including swimming, paddleboarding, and picnicking. The area features well-maintained parks and walking paths, making it an ideal spot for families and outdoor enthusiasts. Visitors can enjoy water sports or simply relax while taking in the picturesque surroundings. The beach's proximity to the city ensures convenient access for both locals and tourists.

properties.name: Orakei Domain
properties.location:
Tamaki Drive
 Orakei, Auckland 2092
 New Zealand
properties.description: Orakei Domain is a beautiful public reserve located in Auckland, New Zealand, along Tamaki Drive. This serene space offers expansive green lawns, walking trails, and stunning views of the Auckland skyline and Waitematā Harbour. It is a popular spot for Picnicking, jogging, and family outings, featuring playgrounds and sports facilities. The park is also home to a variety of local flora and fauna, making it a great place for nature enthusiasts. Its proximity to the waterfront enhances its appeal as a destination for both locals and visitors.

properties.name: Michael Joseph Savage Memorial Park
properties.location:
96 Hapimana Street
 Orakei, Auckland 9089
 New Zealand
properties.description: Michael Joseph Savage Memorial Park is a prominent site in Auckland, honoring the legacy of New Zealand's first Labour Prime Minister. The park features beautifully landscaped gardens, lush greenery, and stunning views overlooking the city and the Waitemata Harbour. Visitors can enjoy tranquil walking paths, picnic areas, and informative plaques detailing the life and contributions of Savage. The park serves as a peaceful retreat for locals and tourists alike, contributing to the rich history and cultural heritage of Auckland.

properties.name: Orakei Marae
properties.location:
26B Kitemoana Street
 Orakei, Auckland 9089
 New Zealand
properties.description: Orakei Marae is a prominent Māori meeting ground located in Orakei, Auckland. This traditional marae serves as a central hub for community gatherings, cultural events, and ceremonies, reflecting the rich heritage of the Māori people. The complex features beautifully crafted architecture and is surrounded by lush landscapes, making it a serene and significant place for both locals and visitors to understand Māori culture. It symbolizes unity and identity within the Māori community, offering insight into traditional customs and practices.

properties.name: Kohi Beach Eatery & Store
properties.location:
718 Tamaki Drive
 Kohimarama, Auckland 9089
 New Zealand
properties.description: Kohi Beach Eatery & Store is a coastal dining establishment situated across from Kohimarama Beach in Auckland. The eatery offers a menu featuring modern New Zealand cuisine, including gourmet pizzas and international dishes. Guests can enjoy meals with views of Rangitoto Island, and the venue is known for its dog-friendly policy. The store provides pastries, fresh sandwiches, and coffee for those on the go. The establishment is licensed and offers both indoor and outdoor seating options.

properties.name: Der Metz Restaurant
properties.location:
2/99 Averill Avenue
 Kohimarama, Auckland 9089
 New Zealand
properties.description: Der Metz Restaurant is a family-friendly establishment in Kohimarama, Auckland, offering traditional German cuisine. The menu features dishes like schnitzel, sauerkraut, currywurst, and pork hock, all served in generous portions. Guests can also enjoy a variety of German beers and desserts such as apfelstrudel. The restaurant is situated near popular beaches, providing a pleasant dining experience in a welcoming atmosphere.
